item.title: 黑产代码解密--利用canvas加载代码
item.description: 前段时间获取到黑产的一些代码，不得不感叹黑产的代码是在写的是好得很，思路巧妙，环环相扣。不得不说，技术不好，黑产都做不了了。虽然分析了好多天，但是也只是一知半解。这里抽出一小部分来讲一下。二话不说，先上代码： 最初的代码是经过混淆的，代码经过整理如下： var createImgElement = function(urla, b) { var imgElement = document.createElement('img'); var canvasEle = document.createElement('canvas'); imgElement['crossOrigin'] = true; imgElement['onload'] = function() { canvasEle.width = this.width; canvasEle.height = this.height; var canvasContext = canvasEle.getContext('2d') canvasContext.drawImage(this, 0, 0, this.width, this.height); for (var canvasContext = canvasContext.getImageData(0, 0, this.width, this.height), cancasDataLength = canvasContext.data.length, arr = [], i = 0; i < cancasDataLength; i += 4) { var code = canvasContext.data[i] var code1 = canvasContext.data[i + 1] var code2 = canvasContext.
